prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a vibrant red body and yellow spots.
Imagine a playful octopus Pokemon designed for underwater adventures.
Show me a unique aquatic creature inspired by marine life with a striking color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that resembles an octopus and has powerful water-based abilities.
Generate a creature that can blend into the ocean with bright colors and playful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that uses its tentacles for combat and has a cheerful personality.
Give me an aquatic Pokemon that thrives in both sea and urban environments.
